fulltext: ca81fa08d36211e2a2aa782bcb074135b21158a773424785864b1242809f912b;2018-11-15T16:40:13Z;corpus;corpus:text;CW Corpus;The Complex Word (CW) Corpus contains 731 sentences each with one annotated CW.  These simplifications were mined from Simple Wikipedia edit histories.  Each entry gives an example of a sentence requiring simplification by means of a single lexical edit.  This resource is primarily designed for the evaluation of CW identification systems.;2013-06-12
name: 99805ef1-bcc6-5be1-aa0b-44be5487d492
notes: The Complex Word (CW) Corpus contains 731 sentences each with one annotated CW.  These simplifications were mined from Simple Wikipedia edit histories.  Each entry gives an example of a sentence requiring simplification by means of a single lexical edit.  This resource is primarily designed for the evaluation of CW identification systems.
title: CW Corpus
